title: Ticket #2788: [Debian] Soap code doesn't work with gsoap 2.8
description: The soap code in Condor works with gsoap 2.7 but not gsoap 2.8.
remarks:
2012-Feb-02 09:36:08 by jfrey:
I just did a proper build of the master branch on Ubuntu 11.10 with the SOAP features and it completed successfully. The machine had gsoap 2.8.3 installed.

2012-Feb-02 13:24:47 by mih:
Indeed, I can also confirm that whatever it was that I found before, it is no longer happening on Debian wheezy with GSOAP 2.8.4. Time to enable it for the package, I guess.
creator: jfrey
